# backgroundColor

**Instance Property**

The background color of the row.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var backgroundColor: NSColor { get set }
```

## Discussion

The property defaults to the table view’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/backgroundColor], unless [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/usesAlternatingRowBackgroundColors] is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. In that case, the colors alternate, and are automatically updated as required by insertions and deletions.

The value of the background color can be customized in the `NSTableViewDelegate` method `tableView:didAddRowView:forRow:`. The property is animatable.

## Overriding Row View Display Characteristics

- **drawBackground(in:)**: Draws the background of the row in the rectangle.
- **drawDraggingDestinationFeedback(in:)**: Draws the row’s dragging destination feedback when the entire row is a drop target.
- **drawSelection(in:)**: Draws the selected row.
- **drawSeparator(in:)**: Draws the horizontal separator between table rows.
